Text:
Thank You! One of my favorite albums. Sound is excellent. 

only 2 things: try adding tracknumbers to the filenames and why did you add 1GB SACD.isz? 
IMO unnecessary addition to torrentsize.
Thank you for this beautiful package,agree with previous comment about the isz.just as a suggestion,certainly not as criticism-tom
SACD.isz - full SACD layer (in compressed iso format) for power users. ;)
Didn't know about that-will look into it-Thanks again

ok, guess i'm not a poweruser, since i have no idea what to do with a sacd layer or how to burn it. Even if, it wouldn't fit in my cd-player. 

And why use WMA. Argh! I hate those ms-codecs. But I'm not complaining, I'm still really happy with this (and i can allways recode lossless). If you have any more of this quality... :)
Yes, I have. ;) To be continued...
